#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<queue>
//#include <map>
struct node{
    long long val;
    node(long long x){
    val=x;
    }
    bool operator < (const node & p)const{return val>p.val;}
   };
int main()
{
	int t,i;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	int g=1;
	while(g<=t)
	{
		int k,n,temp;
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
		std::priority_queue<node> pq;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&temp);
			pq.push(node(temp));
		}
		//printf("%d",pq.size());
		while((pq.size()-1)%(k-1)!=0)
		{
			pq.push(node(0));
		}
		
		long long ans=0;
        
        //node o(0);
		while(pq.size()!=1)
		{  node o(0);
		   long long  sum=0;
			for(i=0;i<k;i++)
			{   o=pq.top();
			   pq.pop();
				sum+=o.val;
			}
			o.val=sum;
			pq.push(o);
			ans+=sum;
		}
		
		printf("Case %d: %lld\n",g,ans);
		g++;
	}
}
